attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ema payments made to children who are in full time education is an unfair system.Children who have a parent/parents who earn over £30,000  are unable to get this allowance.Why should this be?why should our children be not given an allowance because we earn over £30,000.
These payments should be made to all children over 16 and in full time education or not at all.
Please stop this Robin Hood scheme,Please do not forget a large percentage of the people who earn over £30,0000 also pay a higher rate of tax?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
